trans-unit.target:
TEXT_BANYOK103_05338_SEQ_00<tab>Vuyargur wishes to acquire materials in exchange for your services rendered.
※Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level. Furthermore, you may not proceed with a class or job that is different from when you accepted this quest.
TEXT_BANYOK103_05338_SEQ_01<tab>Speak with the traveling trader in Worlar's Echo.
TEXT_BANYOK103_05338_SEQ_02<tab>Deliver the requested items to the traveling trader.
TEXT_BANYOK103_05338_SEQ_03<tab>Deliver the essential construction supplies to Vuyargur.
TEXT_BANYOK103_05338_TODO_00<tab>Speak with the traveling trader in Worlar's Echo.

TEXT_BANYOK103_05338_TODO_01<tab><var 08 E4E8050A ((<var 08 E3E802E803 ((Synthesize <var 31 ((Item)) 04E8060302 /var>)) ((Deliver <var 31 ((Item)) 03E8060302 /var> to the traveling trader)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E8050B ((<var 08 E3E802E803 ((Synthesize <var 31 ((Item)) 04E8060302 /var>)) ((Deliver <var 31 ((Item)) 03E8060302 /var> to the traveling trader)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E8050C ((<var 08 E3E802E803 ((Synthesize <var 31 ((Item)) 04E8060302 /var>)) ((Deliver <var 31 ((Item)) 03E8060302 /var> to the traveling trader)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E80509 ((<var 08 E3E802E803 ((Synthesize <var 31 ((Item)) 04E8060302 /var>)) ((Deliver <var 31 ((Item)) 03E8060302 /var> to the traveling trader)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E8050D ((<var 08 E3E802E803 ((Synthesize <var 31 ((Item)) 04E8060302 /var>)) ((Deliver <var 31 ((Item)) 03E8060302 /var> to the traveling trader)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E8050E ((<var 08 E3E802E803 ((Synthesize <var 31 ((Item)) 04E8060302 /var>)) ((Deliver <var 31 ((Item)) 03E8060302 /var> to the traveling trader)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E8050F ((<var 08 E3E802E803 ((Synthesize <var 31 ((Item)) 04E8060302 /var>)) ((Deliver <var 31 ((Item)) 03E8060302 /var> to the traveling trader)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E80510 ((<var 08 E3E802E803 ((Synthesize <var 31 ((Item)) 04E8060302 /var>)) ((Deliver <var 31 ((Item)) 03E8060302 /var> to the traveling trader)) /var>)) (()) /var>)) /var>)) /var>)) /var>)) /var>)) /var>)) /var>)) /var>.
TEXT_BANYOK103_05338_TODO_02<tab>Deliver the essential construction supplies to Vuyargur.

TEXT_BANYOK103_05338_VUYARGUR_000_001<tab>It goes without saying, but we require a prodigious amount of supplies for the restoration. In order to augment our stores, Nopli has kindly introduced us to a traveling trader from the capital.

TEXT_BANYOK103_05338_VUYARGUR_000_002<tab>When I spoke with the trader about what we require, I chanced to mention your involvement in the restoration─and what should he do but request your crafting services as payment.

TEXT_BANYOK103_05338_VUYARGUR_000_003<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, do you recall the merchant who requested your services as payment for supplies? Well, so impressed was he by your previous effort, he would like to engage you again.
TEXT_BANYOK103_05338_VUYARGUR_000_004<tab>The man is presently come to Worlar's Echo. If you are willing to take on the task, I will see to it that you are duly compensated for your labors.
TEXT_BANYOK103_05338_PELUPELU05338_000_005<tab>Ah, so you are <var 29 EB02 /var>! I've heard much about your expert artisanry. It's an honor to make your acquaintance!

TEXT_BANYOK103_05338_PELUPELU05338_000_006<tab>Now, you'll excuse me if I get right to business. Of late, the people of the city have developed a fondness for foreign things. I'd like you to craft items that fill that niche.

TEXT_BANYOK103_05338_PELUPELU05338_000_007<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, it's always a pleasure. This hardly came as any surprise, but your previous creations fairly flew off the shelves!
TEXT_BANYOK103_05338_PELUPELU05338_000_008<tab>Now then, as Vuyargur will have told you, I'd like you to craft more articles of foreign design.

TEXT_BANYOK103_05338_PELUPELU05338_000_009<tab>This time, I seek Eorzean-style house plaques─three of them, shall we say. These materials should suffice for the quantity, but if you have need of more, please help yourself to the contents of that crate.

TEXT_BANYOK103_05338_PELUPELU05338_000_010<tab>This time, I seek Eorzean-style wall decorations─three of them, shall we say. These materials should suffice for the quantity, but if you have need of more, please help yourself to the contents of that crate.

TEXT_BANYOK103_05338_PELUPELU05338_000_011<tab>This time, I seek paint of a color uncommon in Tural─three pots, shall we say. These ingredients should suffice for the quantity, but if you have need of more, please help yourself to the contents of that crate.
TEXT_BANYOK103_05338_SYSTEM_000_012<tab>The crate appears to be filled to the brim with sundry materials─none of which you require at this time.
TEXT_BANYOK103_05338_SYSTEM_000_013<tab>You obtain additional crafting materials from the crate.
TEXT_BANYOK103_05338_PELUPELU05338_000_014<tab>Dare I hope the requested items are ready?
TEXT_BANYOK103_05338_PELUPELU05338_000_015<tab>Oho, marvelous! These are bound to fetch a high price! Here, please accept these supplies as payment for your services.
TEXT_BANYOK103_05338_PELUPELU05338_000_016<tab>Vuyargur will find they're more than what we agreed on, but in light of what you've provided, it's only fair. You have my heartfelt thanks!
TEXT_BANYOK103_05338_PELUPELU05338_100_016<tab>My thanks again for your services, and please pass along my regards to Vuyargur!
TEXT_BANYOK103_05338_VUYARGUR_000_017<tab>Ah, you are returned. Did everything proceed smoothly with the merchant?
TEXT_BANYOK103_05338_VUYARGUR_000_018<tab>Goodness me, this is far more supplies than I was expecting! If this is what's considered fair payment, then your work must have been impressive indeed.

TEXT_BANYOK103_05338_VUYARGUR_000_019<tab>With foreigners being regarded more favorably of late, decorating one's home in foreign fashion has apparently become commonplace. For the merchant to invest in this venture, he must have had confidence in your familiarity with the arts from across the salt.

TEXT_BANYOK103_05338_VUYARGUR_000_020<tab>The Pelupelu never cease to amaze me with their eye for opportunity. And thanks to your capable cooperation, we were able to secure a generous amount of supplies.
TEXT_BANYOK103_05338_VUYARGUR_000_021<tab>Should the merchant return with another request, I hope that we can depend on your expertise again.
